title: Ferrari walks the plank
summary: Ferrari reckoned the Hungaroring’s layout offered one of its best chances of being competitive in the remaining races after a dispiriting first half of the season in which it had…

qa_pairs.question: Which track is known for providing a good opportunity for Ferrari to be competitive in the 2023 F1 season?
What has Ferrari experienced in the first half of the 2023 F1 season?
In which season did Ferrari express optimism about their competitiveness at the Hungaroring?
